name: TAYO Garage Station
description: Tayo and his friends are waiting for you at the garage! Help our little bus friends to drive safely. From car washes to maintenance, try out a variety of games at the garage, and also collect cute stickers.   TAYO Garage Game Revamp!  - TAYO Garage Game has been revamped. Experience an even more fun variety of games at the garage!   Play different sorts of games at the garage.  - Car wash - Changing parts / tires - Cleaning engines - Hide and seek  - Traffic safety quiz - Talent show  Theres a lot of other games waiting for you to try! Accomplish missions to help our little buses drive safely.    Learn while having fun at the same time.  - By washing and cleaning up with Tayo and his friends, youll naturally learn daily habits and grow your curiosity about vehicles and your own sense of accomplishment! Enjoying various games through touching the screen will naturally develop your cognitive abilities and thinking skills.   Collect cute stickers.  - Enjoy the garage games and get the little bus stickers! Collect all the stickers of our cute friends.
